subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Horses
lead_paragraph: Like no other horseman in the world, Sheik Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum has learned that it is easier to build the world’s tallest building than it is to win a Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Like no other horseman in the world, Sheik Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum has learned that it is easier to build the world’s tallest building than it is to win a Kentucky Derby.
